name: debug-chain
description: Systematic debugging from symptoms to verified fix

stages.description: Four-phase systematic debugging: investigate, analyze patterns, hypothesize, implement
Trace the root cause through the dependency chain
Implement the fix based on root cause analysis

gate.prompt: Review the fix for correctness and side effects

stages.description: Write regression tests covering the bug and fix
Run all tests and verify the fix resolves the original issue

gate.prompt: Verify the original bug is fixed and no regressions introduced
